name: Pipe Man Free - Dream Logic Puzzle Pipeline Game for iPhone
name_original: Pipe Man Free - Dream Logic Puzzle Pipeline Game for iPhone
description:
[ Fantastic puzzles and now every levels are free ]

Pipes are mixed and the plumber is stuck. Your goal is to help the plumber to build pipelines in the right places. One another in difficult puzzle to wait for your solution. This game is really fun and addictive. Try it yourself!

========
FEATURES
========

+ easy gameplay
+ interesting puzzles
+ lots of fun for hours
+ 54 awesome free levels

[ MORE GAMES ]

We have also made lot of other games, so type ”codecube brothers” to itunes search field and you can find our other games, which are already available in the appstore! Happy gaming! :)

[ FEEDBACK ]

We can't answer messages that are written on reviews, so please send your feedback, wishes and bug reports to us support [at] ccbrothers [dot] com
